content.rendered:
beauty bar in guelph | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in guelph, ontario. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeAtTen®

book now!

beauty bar in guelph | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 19 quebec street guelph, ontario
  • 519-265-7410
  • guelph@thetenspot.com
  • licensed to serve alcohol

Hours

mon.: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

tue. - fri: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat.: 9:00 am – 6:00 pm

sun.: 11:00 am - 5:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

I am very happy with my service at Ten Spot for BIAB (Builder in a bottle) manicure! Typically a gel manicure lasts me all of two days before the tops of my gel nails chip off. It has now been almost seven days and my manicure is still going strong! I was pleased with how the colour “Dolly” recommended by aesthetician, Geraldine turned out . I enjoyed a lovely conversation and felt well cared for. Would highly recommended the Ten Spot and the BIAB manicure!
Rachelle Sloot
1721323918
I love Ten Spot, always a great experience! Great customer service, the staff are so friendly. Wendy is the best, such a perfectionist and a lovely conversationalist! Highly recommend
Lea Hutton
1719699721
I had a pedicure today with Heather. Without a word of a lie, the best pedicure I’ve ever had done (I have been to many different places for pedicures). Heather took her time and has amazing attention to detail. My nails are perfectly shaped and painted and my feet are nice and soft. As a bonus, the coffee was great too. I will be back to book again. Thanks so much, Heather, and team for a great experience.
Sydney Pereira
1719441137
They did an amazing job on my wax. Loved that they give you a chance to check before you leave. The price is definitely worth it and with the membership is even better
Emma Horsley
1712876306
Zahra was so kind and personable. She did an amazing job on my nails and made sure that everything was as I'd like. Highly recommend!n
Jacoba Marije
1711161056
I was just there today...I had upper lip, chin wax, eyebrow wax and tint and eyelash tint as well as my first Brazilian wax 😬😬😬The staff was friendly, and the facilities were clean. They had some really cute product for sale...their nail polish line is called "get nailed" and the colour names are so cute. Like, you're place or my car...lol gave me a good giggle!Ger was my esthetician and she was AMAZING!!! Not only did she do an amazing job, she made me feel completely comfortable! She was completely friendly and professional and talked enough to distract me. She went through the process and made sure I was comfortable with the temperature of the wax.I am a bigger girl and was A: Scared of the pain and B: nervous about getting a full wax "down there" but honestly it wasn't that bad, and Ger made the whole experience a wonderful one. I will never be shaving again as I am thrilled with the results....being in bathing suit season!Ten Spot-You Rock and happy 10 years to the Guelph location! I definitely left feeling like a 10! ❤️
Joy Darroch
1709941655
EDIT: After this happened in December 2023, the assistant manager called me after seeing this review and took the initiative to investigate what happened and do something about it, which I appreciated so much. I decided to go back yesterday since I was happy with the assistant manager reaching out. I booked in with someone different and was very happy with my service and the person I booked with. It was a much better experience. When I went to pay, I was also pleasantly surprised that I was provided with a 50% off discount due to my previous experience. I just want to publicly thank the folks who did what they could to fix the situation.I booked a wax in and have been booking in with various staff for years. I have been getting this particular type of wax for even longer. For the first time ever I was told that the hair I had was too long and because of this I couldn’t receive my full service because her next client was already there. The technician said she would see about additional discounts, which were not provided. I was charged for the lesser service. Needless to say, I wont be going back after this experience. I would rather find a place that gives all their clients the same experience they were expecting.
Natalie Maxwell-Brown
1708003768
I love coming here to visit Ger, she’s professional and you instantly feel at ease. I love the quicky facial and peels. The facility is spotless, the hours cater to my schedule and online booking is easy!
Sarah Matheson
1707406056
My first time at The Ten Spot, I got Amberley to do my nails & was SO please she listened to my request “not” to use those machines to take shellac off my nails, after listening to my concern she did not hesitate to do it manually. She was friendly & very professional. She sure made this a great experience & my nails look fabulous!
Marta Fonseca
1706389834
My Technician - Squeezed me in because I didn't have an appointment and I had a job interview coming up this week so, because they were fully booked, she took her time away from her break, took her time, was patient and gentle, she wanted to make sure I was happy with her performance! She did a great job and was such a Professional!I will always come back here to get all my personal needs taken care of that I can't do myself at home!
Teresa O'Reilly
1701696540
‹
›
